onboarding.title_header: Be Ready to Transform Your Fitness Journey with WinxFit!

aboutus.title_header: We encourage healthy lifestyles through engaging fitness challenges
aboutus.title_desc: WinxFit is a revolutionary fitness platform that motivates you to stay active, achieve goals, and earn exciting rewards. Join a community of fitness enthusiasts and start competing in challenges designed for everyone – whether you’re a beginner or an advanced athlete.
